mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(nickname) as cnt FROM members WHERE UPPER(nickname) = UPPER(#{nickname})
SELECT COUNT (email) as cnt FROM members WHERE UPPER(email) = UPPER(#{email})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(memberno, gradeno, id, passwd, mname, nickname, email, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, birth, points, mdate) VALUES (members_seq.nextval, 1, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{mname}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{birth}, 0, sysdate)
